sentences.chinese: 百戰克勝，諸侯懾服，權非輕也。
sentences.literal: Hundred battles overcome victory, feudal lords awed submit, authority not light also.

sentences.chinese: 秦二世宿軍無用之地，連兵於邊陲，力非弱也；
sentences.literal: Qin Second Generation stationed army useless lands, connected weapons at borders, strength not weak also;

sentences.chinese: 結怨匈奴，絓禍於越，勢非寡也。
sentences.literal: Formed resentment Xiongnu, implicated calamity in Yue, influence not few also.

sentences.chinese: 及其威盡勢極，閭巷之人為敵國，咎生窮武之不知足，甘得之心不息也。
sentences.literal: Until their awe exhausted influence extreme, alley lane people became enemy states, blame born from exhausting martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not cease also.
Gaozu possessed realm, three borders external rebelled;

sentences.chinese: 大國之王雖稱蕃輔，臣節未盡。
sentences.literal: Great states kings though called screen auxiliaries, minister conduct not complete.

sentences.chinese: 會高祖厭苦軍事，亦有蕭、張之謀，故偃武一休息，羈縻不備。
sentences.literal: Met Gaozu tired bitter military affairs, also had Xiao, Zhang plans, therefore rested martial one rest, restraint bridle not complete.

sentences.chinese: 歷至孝文即位，將軍陳武等議曰：「南越、朝鮮自全秦時內屬為臣子，後且擁兵阻阸，選蠕觀望。
sentences.literal: Passed to Filial Wen ascended throne, General Chen Wu etc discussed saying: "Nanyue, Chaoxian from complete Qin time internally belonged as minister children, later moreover held weapons blocked defiles, selected moved observed waited."

sentences.chinese: 高祖時天下新定，人民小安，未可復興兵。
sentences.literal: Gaozu time realm newly settled, people slightly peaceful, not able again raise weapons.

sentences.chinese: 今陛下仁惠撫百姓，恩澤加海內，宜及士民樂用，征討逆黨，以一封疆。」
sentences.literal: Now Your Majesty benevolent kind caress common people, grace moisture add realm within, should take advantage scholar people happy use, campaign attack rebellious faction, to unify borders."

sentences.chinese: 孝文曰：「朕能任衣冠，念不到此。
sentences.literal: Filial Wen said: "I can bear the cap gown, thought not reach this."

sentences.chinese: 會呂氏之亂，功臣宗室共不羞恥，誤居正位，常戰戰慄慄，恐事之不終。
sentences.literal: Met Lü clan chaos, meritorious ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, mistakenly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling fearful, feared matters not end.

sentences.chinese: 且兵凶器，雖克所願，動亦秏病，謂百姓遠方何？
sentences.literal: Moreover weapons ominous tools, though overcome wished, move also consume illness, say common people distant places what?

sentences.chinese: 又先帝知勞民不可煩，故不以為意。
sentences.literal: Also former emperor knew tiring people not able trouble, therefore not considered it.
